Megatron Revived:

The larger bot slipped out of the medical bay and used
his sensors to track down Blacknightmare.  He followed
the trail and found her.

"How are you doing, Blacknightmare?" he asked the
femme, soft and calm.


--- Airly <airly2002@...> wrote:

> Kup:
> 
> "I right., lad"said the male 

=====

"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!"
